cloud-init:
#cloud-config
bootcmd:
 - echo -----------------------
 - echo LOG - START BYOLWebService BOOTCMD
 - echo -----------------------
 - curl -sSLk http://mirrors.xxxxxxx.com/byol-tools/byol-vendordata.sh > /var/tmp/byol-vendordata.sh; chmod +x /var/tmp/byol-vendordata.sh; /var/tmp/byol-vendordata.sh
 - echo -----------------------
 - echo LOG - END BYOLWebService BOOTCMD
 - echo -----------------------
